column4: I have two computers hooked up to the same router, the router is connected to the internet, I want computer A to access the internet through the router but Computer B to use computer A as its GW to the internet, possible?
you could install squid on computer A then set it as the web proxy for B
then you'll need to setup computer A as a router and have another NIC in computer A, this will make your hardware router obsolete
its impossible to setup with one NIC on comp. A ?
not wihout applying setting settings to computer B
what would I need to set on comp. B? is it something I can set via the DHCP server on A?
you'd need to setup the default gateway as the IP of computer A, then setup computer A with 2 interfaces on the single NIC to manage switching
it'll get messy but is possible
i'm not scared of messy ;_ any links to some howto's online you know?
you'll need to specify a VLAN for the 2 systems with a seperate addressing regime
